# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/themes.py
@source-hash: d318132e8cdf69b7
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:00:54Z

## Purpose
Theme configuration module that creates the default theme instance for the Rich console library. Acts as a simple factory/initialization module providing the standard styling configuration.

## Key Components
- **DEFAULT** constant (L5): Global theme instance initialized with default styles from DEFAULT_STYLES, serves as the primary theme configuration for Rich console operations

## Dependencies
- **default_styles.DEFAULT_STYLES** (L1): Imports the base styling configuration dictionary
- **theme.Theme** (L2): Theme class that wraps and manages style configurations

## Architecture
Simple initialization pattern - imports required components and creates a single default theme instance. This module serves as the entry point for default theming in the Rich library, separating theme instantiation from theme definition and implementation.
